title: Project #1
description: twitch-drops-miner Container ID: 7232f9701924 192.168.1.99:5173, is a project to mine drops and points and do bets on twitch. The ui seems mostly finished and there's little improvements we can do over time.All the files should be fount locally as well as the image.
instructions: Now, App right now auth, but doesnt farm points or bet or index the followed channels correctly. End objectives is to automatically farm as many points as possible, on as many channels as possible. Place bets by different algorythmic strategies, with database integration to do risk mitigation. Example certain streamers win way more than loose, therefore we can probably bet more points eventually. Always we need some bets to have a sample size, Obviously analize what is already done, and what's left to cook. You can also vibecode to improve this app as well as get the necesary skills to make a good job.

file_structure.gitignore:
# Python environments & cache
venv/**
**/__pycache__/**

# Node.js dependencies
**/node_modules/**
**/.npm/**

# Version control metadata
**/.git/**
